<description type="note">Preliminaries and introductory material omitted<lb/>The following plays have been taken from this source:</description>

Genre: English mystery and miracle plays.
<description type="note">Square brackets represent sections of the textwhich have been deleted or added at different stages in the evolution of the manuscript.</description>

Contemplacio Sovereynes ?e han sen shewyd ?ow be-fore Of Joachym and Anne here botherys holy metynge How our lady was conseyvid and how she was bore We passe ovyr Ã¾at breffnes of tyme consyderynge And how our lady in here tendyr age and ?yng In to Ã¾e temple was offryd and so forth proced Ãis sentens sayd xal be hire be-gynnyng now Ã¾e modyr of mercy in Ã¾is be our sped. And as a childe of iij ?ere age here she xal appere to alle pepyl Ã¾at ben here present and of here grett grace now xal ?e here how she levyd evyr to goddys entent with grace That holy matere we wole declare tyl ffortene ?ere how sche dyd fare Now of ?our speche I pray ?ow spare all Ã¾at ben in Ã¾is place. here joachym and Anne with oure lady betwen hem beyng al in whyte as a childe of iij ?ere age presente here in to Ã¾e temple thus seying joachym. Joachim Blyssyd be oure lord ffayr ffrute haue we now Anne wyff remembyr wole ?e Ãat we made to god an holy a-vow Ãat oure fyrst childe Ã¾e servaunt of god xulde be The Age of mary oure dowtere is ?erys thre Ãer fore to thre personys and on god lete us here present Ã¾e ?onger she be drawyn Ã¾e bettyr semyth me and for teryeng of our a-vow of god we myth be shent. Anne it is as ?e sey husbond in dede late us take mary our dowtere us be-twen and to Ã¾e temple with here procede Dowtere Ã¾e Aungel tolde us ?e xulde be a qwen Wole ?e go se Ã¾at lord ?our husbond xal ben and lerne for to love hym and lede with hym ?our lyff telle ?our ffadyr and me her ?our answere let sen Wole ?e be pure maydyn and also goddys wyff. Maria Ffadyr and modyr if it plesyng to ?ow be ?e han mad ?our a-vow so sothly wole I to be goddys chast seruaunt whil lyff is in me but to be goddys wyff I was nevyr wurthy I am Ã¾e sympelest Ã¾at evyr was born of body I haue herd ?ow seyd God xulde haue a modyr swete Ã¾at I may leve to se hire god graunt me for his mercy and Abyl me to ley my handys vndyr hire fayr fete. Et genuflectet Ad deum. Joachym I-Wys dowtere it is wel seyd ?e answere and ?e were twenty ?ere olde. Anne whith ?our speche mary I am wel payd can ?e gon a-lone lett se beth bolde. Maria To go to goddys hous wole ?e now be-holde I am joyful thedyrward as I may be. Joachym Wyff I ryght joyful oure dowtere to be-holde. Anne So am I wys husbond now in goddys name go we. Joachym Sere prince of prestes and it plese ?ow we Ã¾at were barreyn god hath sent a childe to offre here to goddys service we mad oure avow here is Ã¾e same mayde mary most mylde. Isakar Joachym I haue good mende how I ?ow revyled I am ryght joyful Ã¾at god hath ?ove ?ow Ã¾is grace to be amonge fruteful now be ?e reconsylid Com swete mary com ?e haue a gracyous face. Joachym flectendo Ad deum sic dicens Joachym Now Ffadyr and sone and holy gost on god and personys thre we offre to Ã¾e lorde of myghtys most Oure dowtere Ã¾i servaunt evyr more to be. Anna Ther to most bounde evyr more be we Mary in Ã¾is holy place leve ?ow we xall In goddys name now up go ?e oure fadyr oure prest lo doth ?ow call. Maria Modyr and it plese ?ow fyrst wole I take my leve of my fadyr and ?ow my modyr i-wys I haue a fadyr in hefne Ã¾is I be-leve now good ffadyr with Ã¾at fadyr ?e me blysse. Joachym In nomine patris et filii et spiritus sancti. Maria Amen Now ?e good modyr. Anne In nomine patris et filij et spiritus sancti Maria Amen. Maria Now oure lord thank ?ow for this here is my fadyr and my modyr bothe most mekely I beseche I may ?ow kys now for-?eve me yf evyr I made ?ow wrothe. Et explexendo osculabit patrem et matrem. Joachym Nay dowtere ?e offendyd nevyr god nor man lovyd be Ã¾at lord ?ow so doth kepe. Anne Swete dowtyr thynk on ?our modyr An ?our swemynge smytyht to myn hert depe. [Maria] Ffadyr and modyr I xal pray for ?ow and wepe To god with al myn hert specyaly blysse me day and nyght evyr her ?e slepe good ffadyr and modyr and beth mery. Joachym A ho had evyr suche a chylde nevyr creature ?it Ã¾at evyr was bore Sche is so gracyous she is so mylde so xulde childyr to fadyr and modyr evyr more. Anne Than xulde thei be blyssyd and plese god sore husbond and it plese ?ow not hens go we xal tyl mary be in Ã¾e temple above thore I wold not for al erthe se here fal. Episcopus Come gode mary come babe I Ã¾e call Ã¾i pas pratyly to Ã¾is plas pretende Ã¾ou xalt be Ã¾e dowtere of god Eternall If Ã¾e fyftene grees Ã¾ou may Ascende It is meracle if Ã¾ou do now god Ã¾e dyffende Ffrom babylony to hevynly jherusalem Ã¾is is Ã¾e way Every man Ã¾at thynk his lyff to Amende Ã¾e fiftene psalmys in memorye of Ã¾is mayde say. Maria Maria et sic deinceps usque ad fine xvc i m psalmorum. The fyrst degre gostly applyed It is holy desyre with god to be In trobyl to god I haue cryed And in sped Ã¾at lord hath herde me. Ad dominum cum tribularer clamaui et exaudiuit me. The secunde is stody with meke inquysissyon veryly How I xal haue knowynge of godys wylle To Ã¾e mownteynes of hefne I haue lyfte myn ey Ffrom qwens xal comyn helpe me tylle. Leuaui oculos meos in montes vnde ueniat auxilium mihi. The thrydde is gladnes in mende in hope to be that we xall be savyd all thus I am glad of these tydyngys ben seyd to me now xal we go in to goddys hous. Letatus sum in hijs que dicta sunt mihi: in domum domini ibimus. The fourte is meke obedyence as is dette to hym Ã¾at is a-bove Ã¾e planetys sefne to Ã¾e I haue myn eyn sette Ã¾at dwellys above Ã¾e skyes in hefne. Ad te leuaui oculos meos qui habitas in celis. The ffyfte is propyr confessyon Ã¾at we be nought with-owth god thus but god in vs haue habytacion Per aventure oure enemyes shulde swelle vs. Nisi quia dominus erat in nobis dicat nunc israel nisi quia dominus erat in nobis. The sexte is confidens in goddys strenght A-lon Ffor of all grace from hym comyth Ã¾e strem they Ã¾at trust in god as Ã¾e mownt syon he xal not be steryd endles Ã¾at dwellyth in jherusalem. Qui confidunt in domino sicut mons Syon: non commouebitur in eternum qui habitat in hierusalem. The sefte is vndowteful hope of immortalyte In oure lorde is as gracy and mercy Whan oure lord conuertyth oure captiuite Than Are we mad as joyful mery. In conuertendo dominus captiuitatem syon facti sumus sicut consolati. The eyted is contempt of veynglory in vs Ffor hym Ã¾at Al mankende hath multyplyed But yf oure lord make here oure hous they An laboryd in veyn Ã¾at it han Edyfied. Nisi dominus edificauerit domum in uanum laborauerunt qui edificant eam. The nynte is a childely fer in dede With A longyng love in oure lord Ã¾at ay is blyssyd Arn All they Ã¾at god drede Whiche Ã¾at gon in his holy weys. Beati omnes qui timent dominum: qui ambulant in vijs eius. The tende is myghty soferauns of carnal temptacion ffor Ã¾e fleschly syghtys ben fers and fel ofte ?ough is ffowth with with suech vexacion Ã¾ou seynge god say so clepyd israel. Sepe expugnauerunt me a iuuentute mea dicat nunc israel. The Elefnte is accusatyff confessyon of iniquite Of which ful noyous is Ã¾e noyis Fro depnes lord I haue cryed to the Lord here in sped my sympyl voys. De profundis clamaui ad te domine: domine exaudi uocem meam. The twelfte is mekenes Ã¾at is fayre and softe In mannys sowle with-inne and with-owte Lord myn herte is not heyued on lofte nyn myn eyn be not lokynge a-bowte. Domine non est exaltatum cor meum neque elati sunt oculi mei. The Threttene is ffeyth Ã¾er with with holy dedys don expresse haue mende lorde of davyth And of All his swettnes. Memento domine dauid et omnis mansuetudinis eius. The ffourtene is brothyrly concorde i-wys Ã¾at norchyth love of creaturys echon Se how good and how glad it is bretheryn ffor to dwelle in on. Ecce quam bonum et quam jocundum habitare fratres in vnum. The ffyftene is gracyous with on Acorde whiche is syne of godly love semyth me se now blysse oure lord All Ã¾at oure lordys servauntys be. Ecce nunc benedicite dominum omnes serui dominj. Episcopus A gracyous lord Ã¾is is A mervelyous thynge Ã¾at we se here all in syght A babe of thre ?er age so ?ynge to come vp Ã¾ese grecys so vp-ryght It is An hey meracle and by goddys myght no dowth of she xal be gracyous. Maria Holy ffadyr I be-seche ?ow forth ryght Sey how I xal be rewlyd in goddys hous. Episcopus Dowtere god hath ?ovyn vs comaundementys ten Which shortely to say be comprehendyd in tweyn and Ã¾o must be kept of all crysten men or ellys here jugement is perpetual peyn ?e muste love god severeynly and ?our evyn crystyn pleyn god fyrst ffor his hy? and sovereyn dygnyte he lovyd ?ow fyrst love hym a-geyn ffor of love to his owyn lyknes he made the. Love ffadyr sone and holy gost Love god Ã¾e fadyr ffor he gevyth myght Love god Ã¾e sone ffor he gevyth wysdam Ã¾ou wost Love god Ã¾e holy gost ffor he gevyth love and lyght thre personys and on god Ã¾us love of ryght with all Ã¾in hert with all Ã¾i sowle with all Ã¾i mende and with all Ã¾e strenghthis in Ã¾e be-dyght Ã¾an love Ã¾in evyn crystyn as Ã¾i self with-owtyn ende. Thu xalt hate no thynge but Ã¾e devyl and synne god byddyth the lovyn Ã¾i bodyly enmy And as for ?our self here Ã¾us xal ?e be-gynne ?e must serve and wurchep god here dayly Ffor with pray?er with grace and mercy Se the haue A resonable tyme to fede thanne to haue a labour bodyly Ã¾at Ã¾er in be gostly and bodely mede. ?our A-bydynge xal be with ?our maydenys ffyve Swyche tyme as ?e wole haue consolacion. Maria This lyff me lyketh as my lyve of here namys I be-seche ?ow to haue informacion. Episcopus There is Ã¾e fyrst meditacion Contryssyon compassyon And clennes And Ã¾at holy mayde fruyssyon With these blyssyd maydenes xal be ?our besynes. Maria Here is an holy ffelacheppe I fele I am not wurthy Amonge hem to be Swete systerys to ?ow All I knele To receyve me I be-seche ?our charyte. Episcopus They xal dowtere And on Ã¾e tothere syde se ther ben sefne prestys in dede to schryve to teche and to mynystryn to the to lerne Ã¾e goddys lawys and scrypture to rede. Maria Ffadyr knew I here namys wele were I. Episcopus Ther is dyscressyon devocion dylexcion and deliberacion they xal tende upon ?ow besyly With declaracion determynacion dyvynacion Now go ?e maydenys to ?our occupacion And loke ?e tende Ã¾is childe tendyrly and ?e serys knelyth and I xal gyve ?ow goddys benyson in nomine patris et filij et spiritus sancti. Et recedent cum ministris suis omnes virgines dicent Amen. [Maria] To ?ow ffadyr and modyr I me comende blyssyd be Ã¾e tyme ?e me hedyr brought. Joachym Dowtere Ã¾e ffadere of oure feyth Ã¾e mot defende as he of his myght made all thynge of nowth. Anne Mary to Ã¾i sowle solas he sende In whos wysdam all Ã¾is werd was wrought. go we now hens husbonde so hende Hic joachim et anna recedent domum. for owth of care now are we brought. Maria Be Ã¾e holy gost at hom be ?e brought Systerys ?e may go do what ?e xall Ad virgines to serve god fyrst here is al my thought Be-forn Ã¾is holy awtere on my knes I fall. Lord sefne petycions I be-seche ?ow of here Ffyrst Ã¾at I may kepe Ã¾i love and Ã¾i lawe Ãe secunde to lovyn myn evyn crystyn as my self dere Ãe thrydde from all Ã¾at Ã¾ou hatyst me to with-drawe The fourte All vertuys to Ã¾i plesauns knawe Ãe fyfte to obey Ã¾e ordenaryes of Ã¾e temple echon Ãe sexte and Ã¾at all pepyl may serve Ã¾e with Awe Ã¾at in Ã¾is holy temple fawte be non. The sefnte lord I haske with grett ffere Ã¾at I may se onys in my lyve Ã¾at lady Ã¾at xal goddys sone bere Ã¾at I may serve here with my wyttys fyve If it plese ?ow and ellys it is not Ã¾er with to stryve with prayers prostrat ffor Ã¾ese gracys I wepe O my god devocion depe in me dryve Ã¾at myn hert may wake in Ã¾e thow my body slepe. here Ã¾e Aungel bryngyth manna in A cowpe of gold lyke to confeccions Ã¾e hefne syngynge Ã¾e Aungel seyth Merveyle not mekest maydon of my mynystracion I am a good Aungel sent of god All myght With Aungelys mete Ffor ?our Sustentacion ?e to receyve it Ffor Natural myght We Aungellys xul serve ?ow day and nyght now fede ?ow Ã¾er-with in goddys name we xal lerne ?ow Ã¾e lyberary of oure lordys lawe lyght ffor my sawys in ?ow shewyth sygnes of shame. Maria To thank oure soveryen lord not sufficyth my mende I xal fede me of Ã¾is fode my lord hath me sent All maner of savowrys in Ã¾is mete I fynde I felt nevyr non so swete ner so redolent. Angelus Eche day Ã¾er with ?e xal be content Aunge alle howrys xal to ?ow apere. Maria Mercy my makere how may Ã¾is be ment I am Ã¾e sympelest creature Ã¾at is levynge here. Angelus In ?our name Maria ffyve letterys we han M. Mayde most mercyfull and mekest in mende A. Auerte of Ã¾e Anguysch Ã¾at Adam began R. Regina of regyon Reyneng with-owtyn ende I. Innocent be Influens of Jesses kende A. Aduocat most Autentyk ?our Antecer Anna hefne and helle here kneys down bende Whan Ã¾is holy name of ?ow is seyd Maria. Maria I qwake grettly for dred to here Ã¾is comendacion Good swete Aungel why wole ?e sey thus. Aungell Ffor ?e xal here aftere haue A salutacion Ã¾at xal Ã¾is excede it is seyd Amonge vs The deyte Ã¾at dede xal determyn and dyscus ?e xal nevyr lady be lefte here A-lone. Maria I Crye Ã¾e mercy lorde and Ã¾in erthe Cus recomendynge me to Ã¾at godhyd Ã¾at is tryne in trone. his osculet terram here xal comyn Allwey An Aungel with dyvers presentys goynge and comyng and in Ã¾e tyme Ã¾ei xal synge in hefne Ã¾is hympne Jhesu corona virginum And After Ã¾er comyth A minister fro Ã¾e busschop with A present and seyth Minister Prynce of oure prestes Ysakare be name he hath sent ?ow hym self his servyce in dede And bad ?e xulde ffede ?ow spare for no shame In Ã¾is tyme of mete ne lenger ?e rede. Maria Recomende me to my fadyr sere and god do hym mede These vesselys A-?en sone I xal hym sende I xal bere it my systerys I trowe Ã¾ei haue more nede goddys foyson is evyr to his servauntys hendyr Ã¾an we wende. Systerys oure holy ffadyr isakare Hath sent us hese servyce here ryght now Ffede ?ow Ã¾er of hertyly I pray ?ow nat spare and if owght be leve specyaly I pray ?ow That Ã¾e pore men Ã¾e relevys Ã¾er of haue now Ffayn and I myth I wolde do Ã¾e dedys of mercy Pore ffolk ffaryn god knowyth how On hem evyr I haue grett pety. Contemplacio lo sofreynes here ?e haue seyn in Ã¾e temple of oure ladyes presentacion she was nevyr occapyed in thyngys veyn but Evyr besy in holy ocupacyon And we be-seche ?ow of ?oure pacyens Ã¾at we pace Ã¾ese materys so lythly Away If Ã¾ei xulde be do with good prevydens Eche on wolde suffyce ffor An hool day Now xal we procede to here dissponsacion which Aftere Ã¾is was xiiij ?ere tyme sufficyth not to make pawsacion hath pacyens with vs we be-sech ?ow her And in short spas The parlement of hefne sone xal ?e se and how goddys sone com man xal he And how Ã¾e salutacion Aftere xal be be goddys holy gras.
